alert.note: Alert for Baxter; Fulton; Marion (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 4:50PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Marion, northwestern Fulton and northern Baxter Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 450 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Gassville, or 8 miles southwest of Mountain Home, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mountain Home... Gassville... Salesville... Briarcliff... Diamond Bay... Gamaliel Landing... Fawn Park... Colfax... Lion Hill... Cotter... Vidette... Buford... Elizabeth... Rea Valley... Robinson Point Landing... Henderson... Gepp... Norfork Lake... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for north central Arkansas.
